attributes.action: To look at how the ePetitions team rejects petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is very noticeable that petitions get rejected that are in any way controversial against you and the Government. Therefor you never know the true views of the people

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
